name: Project Haze (2DeepGames)
description:
Project Haze is a psychological horror adventure set in an alternative history Russia and follows the desperate journey of a young boy Yuri and his grandfather Adrik.

The player takes Yuri's role and must use wits and caution to find a path for him and Adrik through the haze of shadows and unknown in this cold world as they seek medicine for Adrik's condition.

The development team's priority was to create an immersive and atmospheric game experience with this prototype that depicts the beginning of the game. Hopefully it manages to enrich your life at least a little bit.

Now, set forth and see how the haze of darkness can test even the firmest bonds...
